text: London Has Fallen is a 2016 action thriller movie directed by Babak Najafi and written by Creighton Rothenberger, Katrin Benedikt, Chad St. John and Christian Gudegast. It is about a major terrorist attack on London caused by Islamic extremists as the G7 attend the British Prime Minister's funeral. It is a sequel to Antoine Fuqua's 2013 movie Olympus Has Fallen. It stars Gerard Butler, Aaron Eckhart and Morgan Freeman, with Alon Moni Aboutboul, Angela Bassett, Robert Forster, Jackie Earle Haley, Melissa Leo, Radha Mitchell, Sean O'Bryan, Waleed Zuaiter and Charlotte Riley in supporting roles. ==References== Category:2016 action movies Category:2016 thriller movies Category:2010s action thriller movies Category:American action thriller movies Category:British action thriller movies Category:Bulgarian movies Category:Movies about revenge Category:Movies about religion Category:Movies about terrorism Category:Movies about abduction Category:Movies set in India Category:Movies set in Asia Category:Movies set in Washington, D.C. title: London Has Fallen
